item.description:
Dinner & or Dance to Momma Kicks

Saturday Sept. 3rd., Dinner 7 pm. Dance 9 pm.

Whippersnappers Londonderry Commans

Rt 102. Londonderry, NH.

Cover charge is usually $5.. after 7 pm.  NO DRESS CODE

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Join Steve Ob1. and about 20 to 30 friends for dancing to one of the best dance Band the East. Come just to dance, or just to help us hold on to some seats and tables. We will be there for dinner and to hold seats and tables at 7. We usually sit on the left side as you walk into the Bar. No dress code. Park becomes harder to find much after 7 also.

Please, let me know as soon as possible. If you are joining us for dinner?
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & or Dance 2 Moma Kicks
